steps.title: Share requirements
steps.description: Share your event details with us date, budget, location, venue type, guest count, and any other preferences, so we can craft your perfect celebration.

steps.title: Get a presentation
steps.description: We'll create a personalized presentation with venue options, vendor recommendations, and a detailed timeline tailored to your vision.

steps.title: Book, Sit back and relax
steps.description: Once you approve the plan, we handle all the bookings and coordination. You can relax and enjoy your special day.
